HiddenText.Name: CE summer session Q12
HiddenText.OpenningText: How do I obtain a NetID, a PIN number, and a BYU-Idaho email account?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: A NetID may be obtained by visiting www.byui.edu/netid. To set up a BYU-Idaho e-mail account, call the McKay Library Computer Help Desk at (208) 496-9000.
